actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to substitute a single subsidy housing program for the existing plethora of programs.

summary.text: Replaces the existing housing subsidy programs with a single subsidy program to be administered by the States. Establishes qualifications for States to require of housing projects.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to substitute a single subsidy housing program for the existing plethora of programs.
